Dr. Emily Beck is attending the renowned Evomics Workshop on Genomics in Český Krumlov, Czech Republic!

This highly competitive workshop brings together leading researchers and emerging scientists from around the world for intensive training in cutting-edge genomics techniques. Emily's selection for this workshop reflects her exceptional research potential and the quality of her postdoctoral work in the Cresko Lab.

## About the Evomics Workshop

The Workshop on Genomics is:
- One of the most prestigious genomics training programs globally
- Held in the UNESCO World Heritage city of Český Krumlov
- Limited to ~40 participants selected from hundreds of applicants
- Taught by world-leading experts in genomics and bioinformatics
- An intensive two-week immersion in state-of-the-art methods

## Workshop Focus Areas

Emily is gaining expertise in:
- Advanced genome assembly and annotation
- Population genomics analysis pipelines
- Transcriptomics and gene expression analysis
- Phylogenomics and comparative genomics
- Cloud computing and big data management
- Latest bioinformatics tools and software

## Professional Development

This workshop provides Emily with:
- Hands-on training from genomics pioneers
- Networking with international researchers
- Exposure to diverse research approaches
- Skills in cutting-edge methodologies
- Collaborative project opportunities

## Emily's Research

The workshop training directly benefits Emily's research on:
- Host-microbe interactions in threespine stickleback
- Genomic basis of disease resistance
- Evolutionary dynamics of immune systems
- Integration of genomic and microbiome data

## International Connections

Attending this workshop:
- Builds international research networks
- Creates collaboration opportunities
- Enhances the lab's global visibility
- Brings new techniques to Oregon
- Strengthens our genomics capabilities

## Knowledge Transfer

Upon return, Emily will:
- Share new techniques with lab members
- Implement advanced analytical pipelines
- Lead workshops on new methodologies
- Strengthen our bioinformatics resources

We're excited about the skills and connections Emily is gaining at this prestigious workshop!
